headline: How Hershey’s chocolate survived an attack from Mars − and adopted a business strategy alien to its founder
summary: A chocolate rivalry in the 1960s transformed a Pennsylvania town and its iconic amusement park.

headline: Earnings To Watch: Hershey (HSY) Reports Q3 Results Tomorrow
summary: Chocolate company Hershey (NYSE:HSY) will be reporting earnings this Thursday morning. Here’s what you need to know.

headline: How Investors May Respond To Hershey (HSY) Securing $1.88 Billion Credit Facility for Expansion
summary: The Hershey Company recently entered into a new five-year unsecured revolving credit agreement for up to US$1.88 billion, replacing its previous facility, and presented at SupplySide West 2025 on October 27 in Las Vegas with Shawn Houser-Fedor as speaker. The increased lending capacity and financing flexibility provide Hershey with added resources to pursue growth initiatives and potential acquisitions as it expands beyond traditional confectionery products. We’ll examine how Hershey’s...
